    • selectAudioFile

      java.lang.String selectAudioFile()
      Method to allow user to select an audio file (AIFC, AIFF, AU SND, or WAVE only) and returns the filepath of the file.
      Returns:
      the filepath of the selected audio file or null if the user canceled

    • updateStatusMessage

      Parameters:
      message - the message to be displayed, a string.
      bgColor - the background color, a color object.
      fgColor - the font color, a color object.

      Returns:
